§ 6603. Application of chapter(a) General ruleThis chapter applies to any Y2K action brought after January 1, 1999, for a Y2K failure occurring before January 1, 2003, or for a potential Y2K failure that could occur or has allegedly caused harm or injury before January 1, 2003, including any appeal, remand, stay, or other judicial, administrative, or alternative dispute resolution proceeding in such an action.

(a) General rule This chapter applies to any Y2K action brought after January 1, 1999, for a Y2K failure occurring before January 1, 2003, or for a potential Y2K failure that could occur or has allegedly caused harm or injury before January 1, 2003, including any appeal, remand, stay, or other judicial, administrative, or alternative dispute resolution proceeding in such an action.

akn:subsection.akn:heading: No new cause of action created

akn:content.akn:p: (b) No new cause of action created Nothing in this chapter creates a new cause of action, and, except as otherwise explicitly provided in this chapter, nothing in this chapter expands any liability otherwise imposed or limits any defense otherwise available under Federal or State law.

akn:subsection.akn:heading: Claims for personal injury or wrongful death excluded

akn:content.akn:p: (c) Claims for personal injury or wrongful death excluded This chapter does not apply to a claim for personal injury or for wrongful death.

(e) Preemption of State law This chapter supersedes State law to the extent that it establishes a rule of law applicable to a Y2K action that is inconsistent with State law, but nothing in this chapter implicates, alters, or diminishes the ability of a State to defend itself against any claim on the basis of sovereign immunity.

akn:subsection.akn:heading: Application with Year 2000 Information and Readiness Disclosure Act

akn:content.akn:p: (f) Application with Year 2000 Information and Readiness Disclosure Act Nothing in this chapter supersedes any provision of the Year 2000 Information and Readiness Disclosure Act.

akn:subsection.akn:heading: Application to actions brought by a government entity

akn:content.akn:p: (g) Application to actions brought by a government entity

(i) Applicability to securities litigation In any Y2K action in which the underlying claim arises under the securities laws (as defined in section 78c(a) of this title), the provisions of this chapter, other than section 6612(b) of this title, shall not apply.
